--- Testing vmulps (packed single-precision multiplication) ---
--- 128-bit normal values ---
Input1: 1.500000 2.500000 3.500000 4.500000 
Input2: 0.500000 1.500000 2.500000 3.500000 
Result : 0.750000 3.750000 8.750000 15.750000 
Hex   : 0x3F400000 0x40700000 0x410C0000 0x417C0000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit normal values ---
Input1: 1.500000 2.500000 3.500000 4.500000 
Input2: 0.500000 1.500000 2.500000 3.500000 
Result : 0.750000 3.750000 8.750000 15.750000 
Hex   : 0x3F400000 0x40700000 0x410C0000 0x417C0000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit boundary values ---
Input1: 0.000000 -0.000000 inf -inf 
Input2: 1.000000 -1.000000 1.000000 -1.000000 
Result : 0.000000 0.000000 inf inf 
Hex   : 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x7F800000 0x7F800000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit boundary values ---
Input1: 0.000000 -0.000000 inf -inf 
Input2: 1.000000 -1.000000 1.000000 -1.000000 
Result : 0.000000 0.000000 inf inf 
Hex   : 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x7F800000 0x7F800000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit boundary values 2 ---
Input1: inf inf -inf -inf 
Input2: 0.000000 -0.000000 0.000000 -0.000000 
Result : -nan -nan -nan -nan 
Hex   : 0xFFC00000 0xFFC00000 0xFFC00000 0xFFC00000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit boundary values 2 ---
Input1: inf inf -inf -inf 
Input2: 0.000000 -0.000000 0.000000 -0.000000 
Result : -nan -nan -nan -nan 
Hex   : 0xFFC00000 0xFFC00000 0xFFC00000 0xFFC00000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit NaN tests 2 ---
Input1: nan -nan 1.000000 -1.000000 
Input2: 1.000000 -1.000000 nan -nan 
Result : nan -nan nan -nan 
Hex   : 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit NaN tests 2 ---
Input1: nan -nan 1.000000 -1.000000 
Input2: 1.000000 -1.000000 nan -nan 
Result : nan -nan nan -nan 
Hex   : 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit NaN tests 2 ---
Input1: nan -nan nan -nan 
Input2: nan -nan -nan nan 
Result : nan -nan nan -nan 
Hex   : 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit NaN tests 2 ---
Input1: nan -nan nan -nan 
Input2: nan -nan -nan nan 
Result : nan -nan nan -nan 
Hex   : 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit NaN tests 3 ---
Input1: nan -nan nan -nan 
Input2: 0.000000 0.000000 -0.000000 -0.000000 
Result : nan -nan nan -nan 
Hex   : 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit NaN tests 3 ---
Input1: nan -nan nan -nan 
Input2: 0.000000 0.000000 -0.000000 -0.000000 
Result : nan -nan nan -nan 
Hex   : 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit memory operand (reg-mem) ---
Input1: 10.000000 20.000000 30.000000 40.000000 
Input2: 0.100000 0.200000 0.300000 0.400000 
Result : 1.000000 4.000000 9.000000 16.000000 
Hex   : 0x3F800000 0x40800000 0x41100000 0x41800000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit memory operand (reg-mem) ---
Input1: 10.000000 20.000000 30.000000 40.000000 
Input2: 0.100000 0.200000 0.300000 0.400000 
Result : 1.000000 4.000000 9.000000 16.000000 
Hex   : 0x3F800000 0x40800000 0x41100000 0x41800000 
--- End of test ---

--- Denormal values (128-bit) ---
Input1: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 1.000000 
Input2: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 2.000000 
Result : 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 2.000000 
Hex   : 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x40000000 
--- End of test ---

--- Denormal values (128-bit) ---
Input1: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 1.000000 
Input2: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 2.000000 
Result : 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 2.000000 
Hex   : 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x40000000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit special: 0.0f combinations 1 ---
Input1: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 
Input2: 0.000000 -0.000000 inf -inf 
Result : 0.000000 -0.000000 -nan -nan 
Hex   : 0x00000000 0x80000000 0xFFC00000 0xFFC00000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit special: 0.0f combinations 1 ---
Input1: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 
Input2: 0.000000 -0.000000 inf -inf 
Result : 0.000000 -0.000000 -nan -nan 
Hex   : 0x00000000 0x80000000 0xFFC00000 0xFFC00000 
--- End of test ---

Input2: nan -nan 340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 -340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000

--- 256-bit normal values (reg-reg) ---
Input1: 1.100000 2.200000 3.300000 4.400000 5.500000 6.600000 7.700000 8.800000 
Input2: 0.900000 1.800000 2.700000 3.600000 4.500000 5.400000 6.300000 7.200000 
Result : 0.990000 3.960000 8.910000 15.840000 24.750000 35.639999 48.510002 63.360001 
Hex   : 0x3F7D70A4 0x407D70A4 0x410E8F5C 0x417D70A4 0x41C60000 0x420E8F5C 0x42420A3E 0x427D70A4 
--- End of test ---

--- 256-bit normal values (reg-reg) ---
Input1: 1.100000 2.200000 3.300000 4.400000 5.500000 6.600000 7.700000 8.800000 
Input2: 0.900000 1.800000 2.700000 3.600000 4.500000 5.400000 6.300000 7.200000 
Result : 0.990000 3.960000 8.910000 15.840000 24.750000 35.639999 48.510002 63.360001 
Hex   : 0x3F7D70A4 0x407D70A4 0x410E8F5C 0x417D70A4 0x41C60000 0x420E8F5C 0x42420A3E 0x427D70A4 
--- End of test ---

Input1: 10.000000 20.000000 30.000000 40.000000 50.000000 60.000000 70.000000 80.000000 
Input2: 0.100000 0.200000 0.300000 0.400000 0.500000 0.600000 0.700000 0.800000
